description: Tail index estimation with random block maxima
README.md: #rbm Tail index estimation with random block maxima. This package implements the random block maxima method proposed by Wager (2014). To install this package in R, run the following commands: ```R library(devtools) install_github("swager/rbm") ``` Example usage: ```R library(rbm) rbm.point_estimate(abs(rt(2000, df = 3))) ``` ####References Stefan Wager. Subsampling Extremes: From Block Maxima to Smooth Tail Estimation. Journal of Multivariate Analysis, 130, 2014. [arxiv]
